VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Borealis Electric Cooperative relative to Silverhaven Hydro Authority?
SRP.A: Borealis Electric Cooperative is {below} Silverhaven Hydro Authority in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total electricity demand?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Stellar Grid Solutions}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total electricity demand?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Zenith Utility Services}.

VE.A: Silverhaven Hydro Authority's electricity demand is {1000903399.13} MWh, Azure Energy Distribution's electricity demand is {1016255974.68} MWh, Borealis Electric Cooperative's electricity demand is {979708399.28} MWh.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Electricity Demand level recorded for Aethelgard Power Grid?

NC.Q: Between 1990 and 1994, did the total Electricity Demand experience a larger or smaller change than between 1990 and 1991?
NC.A: The change in total electricity demand between 1990 and 1994 was {larger} than between 1990 and 1991.

NC.Q: Was the total Electricity Demand in 1993 higher or lower than in 1996?
NC.A: The total electricity demand in 1993 was {lower} than in 1996.

NC.Q: Between 1990 and 1994, was the average total Electricity Demand higher or lower than between 1993 and 1996?
NC.A: The average total electricity demand between 1990 and 1994 was {lower} than between 1993 and 1996.

NC.Q: Was the total Electricity Demand in 1992 higher or lower than in 1993?
NC.A: The total electricity demand in 1992 was {lower} than in 1993.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Stellar Grid Solutions} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Zenith Utility Services, Borealis Electric Cooperative, Azure Energy Distribution, Aethelgard Power Grid, Meridian Energy Network, Stellar Grid Solutions, Silverhaven Hydro Authority}.
